chapters.title: Chapter 1: Fanning the Sparks
chapters.info: Guaire, p. 42 (33)—Name Logain wanted to adopt while traveling. Remembering that the name Guaire might attract unwanted attention due to association with Guaire Amalasan, Siuan convinced him that it was a fool's choice. See also Ablar, Logain; Amalasan, Guaire; Dalyn.
